Name: require_product_owner
Description: Each project must have a Product Owner

Name: require_scrum_master
Description: Each team must have a Scrum Master

Name: enforce_task_status
Description: Task status must not be null

Name: require_user_story_priority
Description: User story must have priority assigned

Name: require_sprint_dates
Description: Sprint must have valid start and end dates

Name: limit_worker_per_team
Description: Limit number of workers per team

Name: enforce_feature_status
Description: Feature status must be one of {planned

Name: require_release_status
Description: ReleasePlan must have status field filled

Name: ensure_backlog_entries
Description: ProductBacklog must have at least one entry

Name: require_skill_certification
Description: Skill should be certified for critical roles

Name: enforce_sprint_goal
Description: Sprint must have a defined goal

Name: prevent_duplicate_tasks
Description: No two tasks should have identical titles
